com.mesosphere.sdk.http.endpoints

Class StateResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.http.endpoints.StateResource

  • public class StateResource
extends java.lang.Object
    An API for reading task and frameworkId state from persistent storage, and resetting the state store cache if one is being used.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StateResource(FrameworkStore frameworkStore, StateStore stateStore, PropertyDeserializer propertyDeserializer)
      Creates a new StateResource which can deserialize Properties.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StateResource

        public StateResource(FrameworkStore frameworkStore,
                     StateStore stateStore,
                     PropertyDeserializer propertyDeserializer)
        Creates a new StateResource which can deserialize Properties. Callers will be able to view the content of individual Properties.
        Parameters:
        frameworkStore - the source of framework id data to be returned to callers
        stateStore - the source of data to be returned to callers
        propertyDeserializer - a deserializer which can turn any Property in the provided stateStore to valid JSON
